name: Lich
title: Ethreain
lore: In life, Ethreain was a powerful mage who sacrificed his kingdom for immortality. Now he is the Lich.

frostBlast.name: Frost Blast
frostBlast.description: Blasts an enemy with frost, damaging and slowing them and nearby enemies.

frostShield.name: Frost Shield
frostShield.description: Surrounds an ally with frost, reducing incoming damage and damaging nearby enemies.

sinisterGaze.name: Sinister Gaze
sinisterGaze.description: Hypnotizes an enemy, causing them to walk toward Lich and draining their mana.

chainFrost.name: Chain Frost
chainFrost.description: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between enemies, dealing massive damage and slowing.
